body_html: It could be interesting to understand also if the dataset api is ready to work on the shelf with tf.keras.utils.multi_gpu_model or we still have the same problem already described on keras.
body_text: It could be interesting to understand also if the dataset api is ready to work on the shelf with tf.keras.utils.multi_gpu_model or we still have the same problem already described on keras.
body: It could be interesting to understand also if the dataset api is ready to work on the shelf with `tf.keras.utils.multi_gpu_model` or we still have the same problem [already described on keras](https://medium.com/rossum/towards-efficient-multi-gpu-training-in-keras-with-tensorflow-8a0091074fb2).
